The Investment Manager will invest at any time at least two-thirds (2/3) of the Portfolio's total assets in such securities, and may invest up to one-third (1/3) of total assets in Euro- or European currency-denominated fixed-income securities of non-European issuers.","hsbcCategoryCode":"EF","hsbcCategoryName":"European Fixed Income","dividendYield":0,"distributionFrequency":null,"riskLvlCde":"3","currency":"EUR","expenseRatio":1.36,"marginRatio":null,"initialCharge":2,"annualManagementFee":1.1,"assetsUnderManagement":1749989696,"assetsUnderManagementCurrencyCode":"USD","topPerformersIndicator":null,"topSellProdIndex":"N","investmentRegionCode":"EU","investmentRegionName":"Europe","channelRestrictList":["SI_I"],"fundClassCde":"WIC","amcmIndicator":"Y","nextDealDate":"2025-08-13","surveyedFundNetAssetsDate":"2025-08-12","riskFreeRateName":"Morningstar EUR 1M Cash GR EUR","relativeRiskMeasuresIndexName":"Morningstar EZN Core Bd GR EUR","dayEndBidOfferPricesDate":null,"dayEndNAVDate":"2025-08-12","prodStatCde":"A","allowBuy":"Y","allowSell":"Y","allowSwInProdInd":"Y","allowSwOutProdInd":"Y","allowSellMipProdInd":"Y","annualReportDate":"2024-08-31","piFundInd":null,"deAuthFundInd":null,"weekRangeLowDate":"2025-04-09","weekRangeHighDate":"2025-08-05"}}}
